    Sabja seeds and Chia seeds both are different seeds. Sabja seeds are small black colored round shaped, while chia seeds are a bit larger, oval-shaped, and come in black, white, or sometimes grey color and are loaded with essential nutrients.

  • Can I consume it raw?

    No, as per the recommendation chia seeds should be soaked in water or roasted prior to use for consumption.

It is recommended for people above the age of 18 years. We suggest you to consult with your physician or dietitian before adding to your diet.

    Yes, Flax seeds are naturally rich in dietary fiber. When consumed properly as recommended they may help in your digestion and to manage constipation.

  • Does it comes in 400g packaging only?

    neuherbs Flax Seeds are avialable in 400g and 1kg packaging.

entry.title: neuherbs Sunflower Seeds
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Seeds
Price: 160.00 - 579.00 (2 variants)

neuherbs raw unroasted, deshelled organic sunflower seeds benefits are many. They are naturally rich in vitamin E, essential minerals & essential fats like PUFA & MUFA. Best for heart & skin health

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Good For Skin

    Sunflower seeds are rich in Vitamin E which is a natural antioxidant. It helps reduce free-radical damage, inflammation in the body, thus protecting skin cells.

  • Good For Heart

    Being a good source of unsaturated fatty acids, potassium & naturally sodium-free, these miraculous seeds help manage blood pressure & cholesterol levels.

  • Good For Guilt Free Snacking

    Full of fiber & protein, these delicious seeds keep you full for longer & help avoid unhealthy or guilty snacking.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Raw

    To deliver you the natural gift of mother earth.

  • Unroasted

    To deliver the natural taste with intact nutrients

  • Organic

    To deliver you a quality product.

— How To Use —

  • For Morning Breakfast

    Top it on oats porridge, the chilla, poha, and omelet.

  • For Your Sweet Tooth

    Grind it or use it whole in your muffins or cupcakes for a nutty taste.

  • For Guilt Free Snacking

    Dry roast it in a pan and enjoy its crunchiest taste.

  • These Seeds are Salted?

    neuherbs Sunflower Seeds are raw, unroasted, unsalted, and organic.

  • Can I Roast Them?

    Yes, it can be enjoyed raw or roasted. It can be a quick crunchy & munchy snack as per your preferences and convenience.

  • Are they peeled?

    Yes, neuherbs Sunflower Seeds are raw, unroasted, and deshelled to help you reap the health benefits of sunflower seeds without any extra effort.

  • Does it come in 200 g packaging only?

    No, neuherbs Sunflower Seeds has two packaging options-200g & 1 kg.

  • Can we use it for PCOD seed cycling?

    Yes, Sunflower seeds are naturally good in healthy fats, vitamins, & minerals which may help in managing lifestyle disorders like PCOD. neuherbs Sunflower Seeds are raw, unroasted, clean & organic with premium quality.

  • Do we need to wash them or are they ready-to-use seeds?

    neuherbs organic sunflower seeds are ready-to-use. No need to wash them.
